attributes.action: Reduce car theft and uninsured drivers
attributes.additional_details: Car security has improved significantly over the past 20 years, however, technology has moved on and we can do soo much better. Let’s get rid of uninsured drivers, let’s make it near impossible to steal cars and let’s bring about the end of car crime.
attributes.background: Mandate that all new cars should have a biometric security system to start the car. Additional drivers are given access by the owner. The car validates via mobile/WIFI connection that the MOT, driving licence and insurance are valid.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open, which you may like to sign:

Require additional security measures in new cars to prevent car theft
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632242
